question: World Fisheries Day is being celebrated all over the world on which date?
explanation: World Fisheries Day is celebrated on 21 November every year. The day aims to highlight the importance of healthy ocean ecosystems. It also ensures the sustainable stocks of fisheries in the world. Fishing communities celebrate the day by conduction events like public meetings, rallies, workshops, exhibitions, cultural dramas, and music shows. A study by the United Nations reported that more than two-thirds of the world\'s fisheries have been overfished or are fully harvested.
